Posts.Content: eboogety wrote: I am very concerned that I have breast cancer.  My right breast is swelling and increasingly sore.  Also, I feel like I am being pinched beneath my under arm.  I am swollen beneath my arm and feel definite tenderness all around that area.  I was trying wait until I can purchase an insurance premium to be tested.  I have had such a huge fear of not being able to afford or receive treatment I have not been tested.  Now, that the symptoms are pretty rapidly becoming worse, I am afraid of being told I do not qualifty for treatment because it is no longer treatable.  I am 37 year young woman who has been divorced for ten years with no children and who predictabley lives with her cat, lol.  I am active, social, am a vegetarian of 18 years, conscientious about my nutrition and finally quit smoking two months ago.  Sadly, I still cannot afford an insurance plan, and I lost my job this week.  I don't think I should continue to wait for a good time to address this. Please, where do I go?? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: How can I be tested? eboogety Moderators
